plugins.name: Stream Screen Manager
plugins.description:
Stream Screen Manager revolutionizes the way fast food restaurants manage their digital signage displays. Created by Stream, a leading digital signage company, this Figma Plugin bridges the gap between design and dynamic content management for digital menu boards and drive-thrus. This innovative tool is designed to streamline the content management process, enabling restaurants to update their digital signage directly from Figma - the world‚Äôs premier design tool.

With Stream Screen Manager, users can effortlessly create captivating digital signage layouts tailored to their brand. The plugin facilitates real-time editing of menu pricing, text descriptions, photos, and more, ensuring that your digital displays always reflect the most current offerings and promotions. Whether you‚Äôre looking to make quick updates to your menu or overhaul your drive-thru‚Äôs digital experience, this plugin provides all the tools necessary to achieve your goals with ease.

Key Features:

Real-Time Content Management: Directly update menu items, prices, and promotions across all your digital signage from within Figma. Changes are reflected instantly on your displays, keeping your content fresh and engaging.

Seamless POS Integration: Streamline operations with our plugin‚Äôs ability to integrate directly with Point of Sale systems, ensuring price and menu item consistency across your digital displays and sales channels.

Customizable Templates: Access a library of customizable design templates specifically crafted for fast food restaurants, making it easy to maintain brand consistency across all your signage.

Drag-and-Drop Interface: Utilize Figma‚Äôs intuitive drag-and-drop interface to design your digital signage layouts. Easily add photos, text, and pricing information without needing advanced design skills.

Collaboration Made Simple: Collaborate in real-time with your team members on signage designs. Figma‚Äôs collaborative environment ensures that everyone can contribute to the final product, from marketers to graphic designers.

Stream Screen Manager is perfect for fast food restaurants looking to take control of their digital signage content with the flexibility and power of Figma. Say goodbye to outdated menus and hello to a dynamic, engaging customer experience with Stream Screen Manager. Transform your digital menu boards and drive-thrus today, and serve up the freshest content with ease.
plugins.tagline: Stream Screen Manager allows Stream customers to manage their digital signs via Figma

plugins.name: exportLang.json
plugins.description:
This Figma plugin, named exportLang, streamlines the process of extracting static texts from Figma designs and generating variable names for these texts through ChatGPT. The workflow is as follows:


Data Retrieval:


The plugin reads a JSON file, exportLang.json, where users store static texts from their Figma designs.

Variable Name Assignment:


For each static text in the JSON file, the plugin generates a unique variable name. For example, if there are three texts, the variable names might be text1, text2, and text3.

ChatGPT Interaction:


Using the generated variable names and their corresponding static texts, the plugin communicates with ChatGPT. It sends prompts to ChatGPT, requesting translation of the static texts into variable names.

Response Handling:


The plugin receives responses from ChatGPT, containing suggested variable names. These responses are associated with the original static texts.

Output in JSON Format:


The final output is a JSON file containing a mapping between variable names and their respective static texts. This structured JSON output facilitates easy integration into users' Figma projects.
plugins.tagline: exportLang.json

plugins.name: Chart Cleaner
plugins.description:
Drop your newly exported chart out of RAWGraphs and into Figma, then select it and run the plugin. Voila. Chart Cleaner duplicates the frame, cleans all the layers up, reorganizes everything, and then drops the new chart and legend (if you had one) into a new auto layout, ready for you to add your own copy and styles to. Everything remains editable as you'd normally expect.


Currently supports RAWGraphs SVGs, with Flourish coming soon. Currently cleans bar charts, small multiple bar charts, line graphs, and small multiple line graphs, with more coming soon.


Feedback more than welcome!
plugins.tagline: Quickly cleanup SVG charts, exported directly from RAWGraphs

plugins.name: Xerus
plugins.description:
Xerus helps you to organize the texts of your designs while having powerful tools to automate your text workflow. It synchronizes your figma text and your Airtable database.


Xerus is for free! I am glad I can contribute to the community. Airtable has a free version too, that supports a maximum of text entries, please check their price plan to see which option is best for you.


Getting started

There are several ways to use Xerus in your project. In this website, I explain you step by step how to set up Xerus for your project. Do you want to change the language of all text in your design? Do you want to update all instances of a text? Xerus can do it for you.


Features

  • Text synchronization between Airtable database and Figma.
  • Multiple layer synchronization pointing to the same database entry.
  • Single layer synchronization.
  • Multiple database connections


Incoming features

Do you have suggestions to improve Xerus? Contact me!

  • Import/Export of PO files.
  • Support complex Airtable fields


Updates

  • 1.0: first release
  • 2.0: fixed bug with airtable token and improved the error messaging.
  • 3.0: added support texts with breaklines
plugins.tagline: Xerus allows you to manage large amount of texts in your designs.

plugins.name: LinguaSync
plugins.description:
LinguaSync is in Beta test for limted user.


Features

  1. Context-Aware Translation: By leveraging the strengths of the AI model, which excels at understanding context, this plugin can accurately translate specifications and service screens written in various languages including English, Japanese, Vietnamese, and Korean.
  2. One-Click Translation: To save you from the tedious process of copying and pasting text, we have implemented a feature that allows users to directly select the area within Figma for one-click translation.
  3. Replace Mode: The plugin is equipped with the ability to translate while retaining the existing Figma text format into the desired multilingual language. If you wish, you can simultaneously view the input and output languages without overwriting.
plugins.tagline: Unlock multilingual superpowers with our plugin, using AI to translate and understand context!

plugins.name: Bezier Palette Studio
plugins.description:
Transform your design workflow with this intuitive color palette generator that creates harmonious and accessible color scales. Using advanced HSV color mapping and B√©zier curves, this plugin helps you generate professional color palettes.


Key Features:

  1. Effortless Palette Generation
  2. Auto Naming: Generate intuitive color names automatically based on hue values, ensuring consistency and saving time.
  3. Customizable Steps: Choose the exact number of shades per swatch to suit your project needs.
  4. Powerful B√©zier Curve Control
  5. Interactive Curve Editor: Adjust color transitions using an intuitive B√©zier curve interface integrated with an HSV color picker for unprecedented accuracy.
  6. Predefined and Customizable Curves: Pick from pre-made curves or switch to free-hand mode for full creative freedom.
  7. Accessibility
  8. Contrast Ratio Analysis: Automatically assess each color's contrast ratio against black and white backgrounds to ensure accessibility compliance.
  9. Color Tokens: Assign unique identifiers to every shade for hassle-free referencing across your designs.
  10. Seamless Integration and Export
  11. Export Color Tokens: Export your palette as JSON tokens for integration into your design systems or development workflows.
  12. Figma Frame Export: Instantly export palettes as organized frames within the current page of your Figma file for easy sharing and collaboration.
  13. Style Creation: Create reusable styles directly in your Figma file with one click, streamlining your workflow.


This plugin is perfect for design systems, brand guidelines, or any project requiring consistent color scales. It streamlines the color creation process while ensuring your palettes meet professional quality standards.

Elevate your design process with an intelligent color generation that combines creative freedom with technical precision.
plugins.tagline: Shape Your Palette with B√©zier Curves

plugins.name: SVGReactify - SVG Component Creator
plugins.description:
Figma plugin that allows you to generate single/multiple SVG React & React Native components at once. Prepared as .eslint friendly and support parent color schemas with fill/stroke optimize


Features

  • Generate multiple components at once
  • Save each one or all as files
  • Expand props version
  • Typescript
  • With dimension or without dimensions (for responsive)
  • Icon
  • React Native
  • Ref
  • Memo
  • Prettier
  • Xmlns / Non-xmlns


To use SVGReactify

  1. Run the "SVGReactify - SVG Component Creator" plugin
  2. Highlight icon(s) in your Figma project
  3. Choose the settings of code you want to on left side.
  4. If you hightlight multiple items on project, you will see "Selected Icons" list. Choose one.
  5. Copy with top right side button of code preview icon for only 1 item.
  6. Or export all selected icon(s) as zip file


License

After 3 all days tried full functions, you'll be asked to enter your license key. Your license key will allow you or your team unlimited usage of SVGReactify.


To purchase a license for you or your team, please visit https://gurayyarar.gumroad.com/l/svg-reactify (Gumroad)

plugins.name: Component Utility
plugins.description:
Component Utility

A utility plugin for effortlessly cloning and linking component sets.

Demo: https://youtu.be/j6dRKs2V8dQ


Clone Command

Clones the master component and links the selected instances to it.

  1. Select all the instances that need to be linked to new master component, along with the master component to be cloned.
  2. Run the clone command.
  3. A new master component would have been created and all the selected instances are linked to it.


Link Command

Links the selected instances to the designated master component. It can also links detached instances (or a frame containing similar child elements as the master component) and the designated master component.

  1. Select all the instances that need to be linked, along with the master component to which they should be linked to.
  2. Run the link command.
plugins.tagline: A utility plugin for effortlessly cloning and linking component sets.

plugins.name: Pulpo
plugins.description:
Introducing the Pulpo Plugin for Figma, a powerful tool that seamlessly integrates your Figma files with Pulpo, providing you with a centralized platform to manage all your Figma comments.


With the Pulpo Plugin, you can effortlessly sync multiple Figma files, consolidating all the comments from each file into a single, unified space.


Gone are the days of juggling between different Figma projects to keep track of discussions and feedback. This plugin offers a streamlined workflow, allowing you to visualize and organize all your Figma comments in one convenient location. By bringing together comments from multiple files, you gain a comprehensive overview of the feedback received across your design projects.

Through its intuitive interface, the Pulpo Plugin empowers you to efficiently navigate through your comments, providing seamless access to the context and details of each conversation. You can easily respond to comments, resolve issues, or collaborate with your team members directly from within Pulpo.


With Pulpo's advanced features, you can also assign comments to specific team members, set due dates, and track the progress of discussions, ensuring that all feedback is addressed and actioned upon in a timely manner.


The Pulpo Plugin not only enhances your team's collaboration but also improves your overall design workflow. By centralizing your Figma comments, you can eliminate the need for constant switching between projects, saving you valuable time and effort.


Experience a new level of efficiency and organization with the Pulpo Plugin for Figma. Streamline your comment management process and unlock the full potential of your design collaboration.


For more info visit https://usepulpo.com/
plugins.tagline: All your Figma files comments in one place

1. Run the Plugin: Open the "uiexport" plugin.

2. Select Frames: Click and drag or Shift+click to select the frames you want to include in your PDF on the Figma canvas. üñºÔ∏è The plugin window will show how many frames are selected.

3. Start Export: Click the "Export X Pages" button in the plugin window. ‚ñ∂Ô∏è

4. Processing: Wait while the plugin exports each frame and combines them into a PDF. You can track the progress (%) and see the status of each page (Exporting..., Processing PDF..., Completed). ‚è≥‚öôÔ∏è

5. Download: Once finished, the "Download PDF" button will appear. Click it to save your PDF file! üíæ‚úÖ


‚ú® Features:

‚Üí Exports multiple selected frames into one PDF.

‚Üí Preserves clickable links (both URLs and links between exported frames). üîó

‚Üí Shows detailed progress and status for each frame.

‚Üí Simple and clear interface.


Export your prototypes or presentations with interactive links effortlessly!

plugins.name: Switchbox - Component Instance Replacer
plugins.description:
Switchbox is a powerful plugin designed to help designers migrate from old to new components effortlessly. With bulk replace functionality, users can quickly find and replace components, saving hours of manual work. It's a game-changer for teams transitioning to updated components, making the tedious process of replacing one-by-one a thing of the past. The plugin also supports transferring text data from old components to new ones, ensuring seamless migration.


Stay tuned for upcoming versions, where support for more data types will make migration even smoother and more efficient!

plugins.name: Nova Variable Finder
plugins.description:
A Figma plugin that helps you find and locate nodes that use specific Figma variables in your document.


Features


Node Finder

  1. Search for nodes using a variable ID (e.g. VariableID:1:335)
  2. Search for nodes using a variable name
  3. Click on results to select and zoom to the node in your document
  4. Supports all types of variable bindings


Deleted Variable Finder

Search for deleted variables in your document. Deleted variables are the variables that have been deleted from your variables collection but are referenced in somewhere in your document.


Note: This feature uses the Figma API to search for deleted variables. Unfortunately this API is only available for Entreprise tier client.


How to use


  1. Open the plugin
  2. Click on the "Deleted Variable Finder" tab
  3. Provide the your file ID and your personal access token
  4. Click on the "Search" button
  5. The plugin will search for deleted variables in your document and display the results in the "Results" section
  6. Click on a variable name to search for all the nodes that use this variable in your document
  7. Click on a node to select and zoom to the node in your document
plugins.tagline: Find variables in your file.

plugins.name: Summary Sprint
plugins.description:
Summary Sprint is a user-friendly FigJam plugin designed to streamline your sprint planning and tracking‚Äîall within your favorite collaborative space. Instantly generate a clear overview of planned, completed, and unfinished tasks, visualized as color-coded cards for quick understanding. Choose the estimation method that best fits your team, from Fibonacci points to hours or any numeric values, ensuring a perfect match for your workflow.


How it Works:


Set Up Your Board:

  1. Add sticky notes (STICKY) with tasks and assign effort values.
  2. Group tasks and place them inside a Section.


Run the Plugin:

  1. Generate the Summary Sprint to view your sprint progress in real-time.
  2. Planned, done, and incomplete tasks are presented in distinct color-coded cards.


Track and Iterate:

  1. Review unplanned work and incomplete tasks to improve future sprints.
  2. Add neutral Notes cards for ideas, dependencies, or clarifications without affecting metrics.


Want to learn more?

Check out our Playground for a deeper explanation and additional tips. With Summary Sprint, you can effortlessly plan, visualize, and refine your sprints directly in FigJam.


Made with ‚ù§Ô∏è in Poland.
plugins.tagline: Plan, estimate, and track sprints, visualize progress, reduce overhead, all inside FigJam right now!

plugins.name: Lucide Icons Importer from GitHub
plugins.description:
This plugin allows the user to import always the latest release of Lucide Icons directly from the official Lucide GitHub Repository.


Few steps for the best Lucide Icons experience:


  1. ‚¨Ü - Available Folders to analize the Lucide repo and obtain only the folders where svg files are in.
  2. üóÇÔ∏è - Select the folder to import. I suggest "/icons" to get the main icons library.
  3. ëøø - Select the Icon Name Option between original name or with prefix.
  4. üéõÔ∏è - Set Icon Size, Stroke Width, Color and, if you want test it through the WCAG Contrast Checker.
  5. ü™Ñ - Import the SVGs and wait for the magic.


Most important info:

  1. If you do your second icon import, the plugin will not replace your current library but will only check for differences and integrate the new icons. This way your projects will always be safe from unpleasant surprises ;)
  2. If the icon configuration is different from the one already present in your figma project, a new frame will be created to not overwrite other configurations.



* Let me know your feedback or bugfix requests. *
plugins.tagline: Import always the latest version of Lucide Icons

plugins.name: To the top
plugins.description:
This Figma plugin allows me to move any selected objects to the topmost level of Figma page hierarchy, preserving their absolute positions on the canvas. No more manual dragging, dropping, or adjusting coordinates. Ideal for managing complex nested designs and maintaining a tidy layer structure. Less scroll layers, more control where and how you paste stuff.


It enables two use cases:

  1. Move all selected to the top -> cut -> paste in place in any selected frame or group without moving anything.
  2. Free guides and arrows from being cropped by their parent frames, which is helpful when preparing references and when some modals with clipping=on involved.


Differences from similar plugins - this one support multiple objects, and, doesn't move anything anywhere regardless of whatever coordinates starting pointüòä
plugins.tagline: Move selected elements to the top level of page hierarchy

plugins.name: Layout - Tailwind CSS V4 Import & Export
plugins.description:
Layout is a powerful Figma plugin that transforms your design tokens into Tailwind CSS V4 compatible variables with just a few clicks. It creates a perfect bridge between your design system and development workflow.


Key Features:


  1. Import CSS Variables: Easily import existing CSS variables into Figma as design tokens
  2. Export to Tailwind CSS V4: Generate Tailwind CSS V4 compatible theme files from your Figma variables
  3. One-Click Tailwind Colors: Instantly add the complete Tailwind color palette to your Figma project
  4. Smart Variable Handling: Automatically processes color, typography, spacing, and shadow variables
  5. Preview Before Import: See exactly what variables will be created before importing them
  6. Intelligent Prefix Management: Automatically handles variable prefixes to ensure clean, consistent naming


Perfect For:

  1. Design teams working with developers using Tailwind CSS
  2. Creating and maintaining design systems
  3. Ensuring design-to-code consistency
  4. Streamlining the handoff process between design and development


Layout eliminates the tedious manual work of translating design tokens between Figma and code, saving you time and reducing errors. Keep your design system and code in perfect sync with this essential tool for modern design workflows.
plugins.tagline: Bridge Figma design tokens to the Tailwind CSS V4 config for perfect design-to-code harmony

plugins.name: PixelCast: Create aesthetic design timelpases
plugins.description:
PixelCast: Your Fast, Simple Tool for Figma Timelapses

  1. üé® Craft Timelapses in 3 Clicks ‚Äì Perfect for your social media, portfolio, or website
  2. üé¨ One-Click Export ‚Äì Save and share as video in an instant
  3. üì£ Showcase Your Design Process ‚Äì Let the world see the journey, not just the result


Static is Boring. Show the Process.

Design isn‚Äôt just about the finished product; it‚Äôs about every stroke, nudge, and tweak along the way. PixelCast lets you capture each creative choice, each imperfect draft, and every ‚Äòaha‚Äô moment that brings it all together.


A screenshot is worth a 1000 words. A timelapse is worth a 1000 moments.‚Ä®

We love a good screenshot too, but the real story? That‚Äôs in the details‚Äîthe imperfect ellipses, the text with the font-spacing slightly off, and all the iterations in between. PixelCast lets you share your true design workflow.


How to use the plugin:


  1. Pick a Frame in Figma and click ‚ÄúStart Recording.‚Äù
  2. Design Away! Tweak, adjust, polish, and when you‚Äôre done, hit ‚ÄúStop Recording.‚Äù
  3. Download Your Timelapse Video ‚ú®


Features


Pixel-Perfect Export

Your timelapse videos look exactly like they do in Figma‚Äîclick to export, and you‚Äôre good to go!


Super Lightweight‚Ä®

PixelCast videos are optimized for easy sharing on social media with ultra-light file sizes.


Smart Capture‚Ä®

PixelCast only records changes, so you can take your time to think without filling up frames.


Contact


Got feedback or found a bug? Email us at emailforyash@gmail.com.
plugins.tagline: Beautiful, shareable timelapse videos straight from Figma
